content: fâååxü åéüç|çz by semklita yarn scheepjes whirl 60% cotton 40% acrylic 220 g hook us size e 3 5 mm gauge 24 stitches to 4 10cm 36 row to 4 10cm finished measurements 75 * 35 190 cm * 90 cm after blocking abbreviations us chain chain stitch ch2 space the number of chain in the chain space single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet p 3 chain picot ml the magic loop the number of stitches or spaces on the row © yulia tkachenko semklita s stitch 2018 @semklitas_stitch #summermorningshawl_semklita 1 start with the magic loop row 1 single_crochet into ml 3ch 5dc into ml 2ch 5dc into ml 1tr into ml turn 1 ch3 space 1 treble_crochet 10 double_crochet 1 ch2 space row 2 ch4 2dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 1dc into each stitch to the ch2 space 2dc ch2 2dc into the ch2 space 1dc into each stitch to the ch3 space 2dc 1tr into the top of the ch3 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 18 double_crochet 1 ch2 space row 3 ch4 2dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 1dc into each stitch to the ch2 space 2dc ch2 2dc into the ch2 space 1dc into each stitch to the ch4 space 2dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 26 double_crochet 1 ch2 space row 4 ch4 1dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 ch1 1dc into next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into next stitch* repeat to the ch2 space ch1 1dc ch2 1dc into the ch2 space ch1 1dc into the next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch4 space ch1 1dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 18 double_crochet 16 ch1 space 1 ch2 space row 5 ch4 2dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 1dc into the next stitch *1dc into ch1 space 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch2 space 2dc ch2 2dc into the ch2 space 1dc into the next stitch *1dc into ch1 space 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch4 space 2dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 42 double_crochet 1 ch2 space row 6 ch4 1dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 ch1 1dc into next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into next stitch* repeat to the ch2 space ch1 1dc ch2 1dc into the ch2 space ch1 1dc into the next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch4 space ch1 1dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 26 double_crochet 24 ch1 space 1 ch2 space row
